headline: QUALCOMM (NasdaqGS:QCOM) Extends Talks for Alphawave Acquisition Consideration Deadline
summary: In recent developments, Qualcomm (NasdaqGS:QCOM) has been at the center of acquisition discussions with Alphawave IP Group, extending the timeframe for decision-making, and announcing robust quarterly earnings, while confirming future revenue guidance. Over the past month, the stock moved up by 4%, amid a positive market backdrop highlighted by the US-China tariff agreement, which buoyed tech stocks considerably. Qualcomm's earnings report revealed strong financial performance, with revenue...

headline: AI Chips Update - Revolutionizing Game Development with AI-Powered Visual Tools
summary: Core Gaming has launched its innovative AI COMIC App, aimed at transforming game asset creation through advanced AI technology. This app leverages cutting-edge AI models to convert simple photos or videos into high-quality visuals, including animations and realistic portraits, in mere minutes. It facilitates creative tasks, traditionally requiring substantial time and resources, by providing powerful yet accessible AI tools to artists, gamers, and marketers, thereby enhancing visual...

headline: FTSE 100 today: Index rises as U.S. and China agree to temporarily reduce tariffs
summary: Investing.com -- British stocks traded higher on Monday afternoon, starting the week on a positive note after the U.S. and China agreed to temporarily reduce tariffs, sparking a global rally across sectors, although U.K. pharma stocks faced a setback due to Donald Trump’s move to cut drug prices.

headline: UK takeover panel gives Qualcomm till May 27 to make a bid for Alphawave
summary: British semiconductor company Alphawave IP Group on Monday said the UK takeover panel had extended the deadline for a takeover offer by U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm to May 27. The deadline to make an offer was previously extended to May 12, on Monday, Alphawave said both parties remained in talks and had consented to extend the deadline further.
